reviewText: If you liked the first season of Magic Knight Rayearth you'll love this first volume of Rayeath 2.... I think the story line is great..  So if you havn't seen it yet, do so.

I first fell in love with MKR by reading the graphic novels (BTW - go get them!) So i went and got this tape. The animation is deffinatly lacking (this probably due to the GN's im use to. ^^;;) the VA's are horrid but I love it anyway! If you want the better deal I suggest getting the subtitled version.

I've loved  Rayearth since the first time I saw it.  The second season is even better then the first.  You find out a lot more about the  girls families.  The only thing that bugged me was that teh showed the same flashbacks over and over again.  Other then that it was great!

Once agian your mind is volted back to the magical land of Cephiro in  which the heroines Hikaru, Umi, and Fuu face new challenges as they try to  decide how the new pillar of the land will be appointed.  If you liked  Rayearth Season 1, you'll love Rayearth 2!
I was kind of hanging off an edge when Rayearth 1 finished, but it appears Rayearth 2 will give it closure. A very good buy!
